Reviews.Title: “Very Happy with this clean and comfortable hotel!”
Reviews.Author: Ceri B
Reviews.Content: stayed seven days friendly helpful staff clean comforable twins beds comfortable ensuite bathroom clean shower breakfast day cute dining buses close buy bus ride finsbury park tube station walking distance restaurants grocery stores crouch shopping restaurants coffee bars comfortable walking bus night 30 minutes town tube 45 bus nice neighbourhood cozy bed night

Reviews.Title: “small rooms compared to the USA but nice and effective”
Reviews.Author: plion1
Reviews.Content: clean cozy staff helpful town relaxing town eat withing 10 minute walk japenese spanish english pub 30 pound ride central london 20 minutes sightseeing hotel compare usa bathroom person time clean stay

Reviews.Title: “If you are looking for a budget hotel, this is OK.”
Reviews.Author: brekibrek
Reviews.Content: stayed 2 nights white lodge hotel located north london center relatively quiet location neighbourhood safe police station hotel bus stops nearby easy underground station double bedroom shower unpleasant shower wc shared floor clean breakfast toast egg butter jam tea coffee milk oj cornflakes fruits included price satisfactory wireless internet 2 gbp 24hours quality compared budget hotels london ok

HotelInfo.Address: 1 Church Lane | Hornsey, London N8 7BU, England
